Suggest to add another validator where c = 0.

- I don't have a lot of experience with submitting CodinGame challenges, but I feel like adding more gamemodes will force me to be more precise in the input description, which isn't very good for reverse? Although I'm not entirely sure. I prefer to only submit for either speed+code golf xor reverse, to be sure.

- You're absolutely right for the constraint, not sure of what my reasoning was there. It's fixed, thanks!

- b=0 would make no sense to me, hence the [[b]]Â >= 1 constraint and the fact that there is no test case for this. :)
